item.title: RVRA UI/UX
item.dc:creator: yeshi04
item.description: Overview I designed and developed the TACERS website (https://www.tacers.lk)/ using WordPress, HTML, CSS, and other technologies. The site is fully responsive, featuring a clean, modern design that enhances user engagement and navigability. I implemented a user-friendly interface while ensuring fast performance and seamless functionality across all devices.
item.content:encoded:
Overview

I designed and developed the TACERS website (https://www.tacers.lk/) using WordPress, HTML, CSS, and other technologies. The site is fully responsive, featuring a clean, modern design that enhances user engagement and navigability. I implemented a user-friendly interface while ensuring fast performance and seamless functionality across all devices.
